reviewText: An excellent  and well-made 1998 film, a faithful remake of the American fim "Buona Sera Mrs Campbell, which starred Telly Savalis, Phil Silvers and Gina Lollobrigida. The Indian film, which is not well known by Indians, stars Jeetendra, Rekha, Randhir Kapoor, Rakesh Roshan, Asrani and others. I recommend it.
